name: Followable
description: Exposes additional binding helpers to javascript allowing a loose approximation of template binding from JS

methods.name: bindTo
methods.description: tells a remote instance to have its property match ours when it changes.

arguments.name: target
arguments.description: The remote target to bind to

arguments.name: updatePath
arguments.description: The property name to set on our local isntance if it differs from the remote property name we wish to bind to.

methods.name: bindFrom
methods.description: tells our local property to match the remotes value when it changes

arguments.name: target
arguments.description: The remote target to bind to

arguments.name: targetPath
arguments.description: The property name to set on remote isntance if it differs from the local property name we wish to bind to.
